name: mozilla-pageshot
title: Page Shot
description: Take and share shots of the sites you are on
author: Ian Bicking

preferences.name: backend
preferences.title: Service URL
preferences.description: URL of the service that stores pages

preferences.name: startHttpServer
preferences.title: Start remote-control HTTP server (restart required after changing this)
preferences.description: This starts a server that can be used to control the browser and take shots

preferences.name: httpServerPort
preferences.title: HTTP server: port to listen on
preferences.description: port for the HTTP server to listen on

preferences.name: httpServerIp
preferences.title: HTTP server: IP to listen on
preferences.description: IP/interface for the HTTP server to listen on

preferences.name: readableSleep
preferences.title: HTTP server: sleep variable
preferences.description: When using server, amount of time (in ms) to sleep when handling a readable request

preferences.name: inlineCss
preferences.title: inline CSS
preferences.description: EXPERIMENTAL: instead of including CSS files, inline only necessary CSS in style tags

preferences.name: useReadability
preferences.title: Capture readable version
preferences.description: Captures a readable version of pages in addition to HTML

preferences.name: hasUsedMyShots
preferences.title: Has used My Shots
preferences.description: Indicate if you've used the My Shots button

preferences.name: deviceIdInfo
preferences.title: Generated ID and authentication token for this device
